page.title: 29Manufacturing and Local Business
page.content:
The number of local business activities has increased with the advent of Lingerfield Business Park and Nidd Valley Business Park where businesses include; a porsche specialist, a car care products company, a printers, a furniture restorer, a property developer, a motor engineer and a joinery company. Elsewhere there are a joiners and undertakers, a waste recycling company and a metal working company. There are also two holiday caravan parks in the area. Information Technology now allows business interests to be conducted from home. Business closures include; the Post Office, the shop and the Golf Driving Range.
S Crow
